name: Spaghetti
instructions: Dice onion and garlic finely. Cook in frying pan a couple minutes, then add beef. Cook until brown, then add tomato sauce. Let simmer while you put some water on to boil. Once it is boiling put in the pasta and cook for about 8 minutes. Then serve and enjoy.
note: Honestly I like angel hair or vermachelli better. Or shells, elbows... spaghetti sauce is good, but spaghetti pasta is the worst really.
